participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Rebellious and introspective, often reflecting on her life choices.
participant_1.background: i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.background: i speak chinese. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong. i love chocolate bars.
